name: Building ESG Value
content: Everyone is talking about ESG (environment, social, governance), but what does that really mean in practice? What started as a United Nations social responsibility initiative more than two decades ago has become a business imperative for many organizations and companies worldwide. But what's driving this new ESG momentum and how can companies truly build environmental and social value? Join Lucas Carpenter, Shaista Dhanesar, Cindy Drucker, Ellen Shieh, and Curtis Wilgosh from PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) and WashU Olin professor Trish Gorman for a discussion on the opportunities and challenges regarding ESG strategies. Their conversation will touch on how ESG can advance stakeholder trust, build brand and corporate value, address social impact issues, and help companies recruit and retain the best talent.
